channel.title: 637 bank glitch
channel.description:
when the bank has max cash in it, if you try to add more cash from your inventory, it takes the cash out of the inventory and doesn't put it in the bank ofcourse, but how do i stop it taking the cash out the inventory and send message to player (your bank is full) or something?
what code would i insert to bank.java to achieve this?
any help please?
